cmp: 出 (to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to occur/to happen/(a measure word for dramas, plays, or operas))
mng: to dismiss from office, to expel

exm.mng: to dismiss from office, to expel
to dismiss from office, to ban, to reject
Dismiss the hundred schools, revere only the Confucian (idiom), sole dominant ideology
exm.pyn: bà chù bǎi jiā , dú zūn rú shù

exm.mng: to dismiss, to fire, to degrade
Dismiss the hundred schools, revere only the Confucian (idiom), sole dominant ideology
exm.pyn: bà chù bǎi jiā , dú zūn rú shù
